mapper.select: select max(tran_log_id) as tranLogId, max(tran_type) as tranType, max(description) as description, max(start_tran_date) as startTranDate, max(start_tran_time) as startTranTime, max(end_tran_date) as endTranDate, max(end_tran_time) as endTranTime, max(employee_id) as employeeId, control_number as controlNumber, max(line_number) as lineNumber, control_number_2 as controlNumber_2, max(outside_id) as outsideId, max(wh_id) as whId, max(location_id) as locationId, max(hu_id) as huId, max(num_items) as numItems, item_number as itemNumber, lot_number as lotNumber, max(uom) as uom, sum(tran_qty) as tranQty, max(wh_id_2) as whId2, max(location_id_2) as locationId2, max(verify_status) as verifyStatus, max(employee_id_2) as employeeId2, max(routing_code) as routingCode, max(hu_id_2) as huId2, max(return_disposition) as returnDisposition, max(elapsed_time) as elapsedTime, max(source_storage_type) as sourceStorageType, max(destination_storage_type) as destinationStorageType, max(stored_attribute_id) as storedAttributeId, max(generic_attribute_1) as genericAttribute1, max(generic_attribute_2) as genericAttribute2, max(generic_attribute_3) as genericAttribute3, max(generic_attribute_4) as genericAttribute4, max(generic_attribute_5) as genericAttribute5, max(generic_attribute_6) as genericAttribute6, max(generic_attribute_7) as genericAttribute7, max(generic_attribute_8) as genericAttribute8, max(generic_attribute_9) as genericAttribute9, max(generic_attribute_10) as genericAttribute10, max(generic_attribute_11) as genericAttribute11, max(generic_text1) as genericText1, max(generic_text2) as genericText2, max(generic_text3) as genericText3, max(generic_text4) as genericText4, max(generic_text5) as genericText5, max(generic_float1) as genericFloat1, max(generic_float2) as genericFloat2, max(display_item_number) as displayItemNumber, max(client_code) as clientCode, max(trk_summary_id) as trk_summaryId, max(tran_log_holding_id) as tranLogHoldingId from t_tran_log where tran_type=#{tranType} and control_number=#{controlNumber} group by control_number,control_number_2,lot_number,item_number
